channel.title: Stopping npcs from chasing ppl / making them randomly walk / action ids
channel.description:
Ok...
-- Part 1 --
How can i make it so my npc's don't move? they stay on one spot but if u range/mage them they run after you, how do i stop this?
-- Part 2 -- How do i make npcs walk casually in a range like on rs? Eg. The tzhaar monsters
-- Part 3 -- Anyone got a list of all emotes/action id. All i want is the one in castle wars when they jump-to stepping stone, but a list of all is great thanks!
All help appreciated.
-Thanks

item.title: Stopping npcs from chasing ppl / making them randomly walk / action ids
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:

Ok…

– Part 1 –
